TopicTitle: Mistake in Tylo orbit with viedo to demonstrated it

Articles.Content:
I found a mistake in orbits in jool system. Its very frustating that it shows you some thing that change compleatly when you advanced time only 15 days. It change the direction of the ship in a hiperbolic orbit, compleatly. You can look it in a  few seconds video in my youtube chanel https://youtu.be/IJkzUOJX4P4. I cant up the video here, but i send it to the support. I expend 1030 hours in this game, and its very frustating how when you arrived in most dificult places its broken.

 

I don't know if anybody find this mistake but its very frustrating. I find too many bugs and mistakes during all the time. I dont know why.

What setting is your orbit fade on (reversed or normal?) this is an easy way to tell which direction you will enter from. Also when entering an soi your game should slow your warp to 50x and it didn’t here which might have caused the physics engine to miss a cycle and have your orbit change (if that’s how this works I don’t know how the game actually  runs). I would recommend not warping that fast unless just cruising in solar or an eccentric orbit because it can mess things up and has for me in the past (I’m talking my Ap dropping 2 million km in front of my face.)
